import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; import AuthEstabelecimentoContext from '../../../contexts/auth-estabelecimento'; import '../../../styles/Menu.css'; import logo from '../../../assets/logo.png'; export default function Menu() { const { signOut } = useContext(AuthEstabelecimentoContext); const history = useHistory(); function handleLogout() { signOut(); history.push('/'); } return (
